import { CalendarIcon, LocationMarkerIcon, UsersIcon } from '@heroicons/react/solid' const positions = [ { id: 1, title: 'Back End Developer', type: 'Full-time', location: 'Remote', department: 'Engineering', closeDate: '2020-01-07', closeDateFull: 'January 7, 2020', }, { id: 2, title: 'Front End Developer', type: 'Full-time', location: 'Remote', department: 'Engineering', closeDate: '2020-01-07', closeDateFull: 'January 7, 2020', }, { id: 3, title: 'User Interface Designer', type: 'Full-time', location: 'Remote', department: 'Design', closeDate: '2020-01-14', closeDateFull: 'January 14, 2020', }, { id: 4, title: 'User Interface Designer', type: 'Full-time', location: 'Remote', department: 'Design', closeDate: '2020-01-14', closeDateFull: 'January 14, 2020', }, { id: 5, title: 'User Interface Designer', type: 'Full-time', location: 'Remote', department: 'Design', closeDate: '2020-01-14', closeDateFull: 'January 14, 2020', }, ] const JobLists = () => { return (
    {positions.map((position) => (

  • {position.title}

    {position.type}

    {position.department}

    {position.location}

    Closing on {position.closeDateFull}

    • ))}
) } export default JobLists;
